description: Looks like Dan's decided his thing now is gonna be boasting to newbies about how many scenes he's done with us -- first with Randy, and now with Adam! Well, Dan takes the bait, and before long they're each slurping down a hefty cock and some squirts of pre-cum. Adam's the leaner and less experienced of the two so you'd think he'd be bottoming today, but in fact it's macho Dan who takes it like a man in today's installment. He whimpers like a little bitch as Adam drills into him, and I bet Adam feels pretty proud to be getting some big moans out of the guy who's had so much more sex on film than he has.
title: Adam & Dan, Scene #01
